original_text: Many of the Jews read this sign, for the place where Jesus was crucified was near the city, and the sign was written in Aramaic, Latin and Greek.
korean_text: 예수께서 못 박히신 곳이 성에서 가까운 고로 많은 유대인이 이 패를 읽는데 히브리와 로마와 헬라 말로 기록되었더라

sentences.original_text: Many of the Jews read this sign
for the place where Jesus was crucified was near the city
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님이 십자가에 못 박히신 장소가 성 가까이 있었기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and the sign was written in Aramaic
